const HEMI_HARD_WORDS=18;// yellow for length at 18+
const HEMI_VERY_HARD_WORDS=25;// red for length at 25+
const DELTA_HARD=1;// yellow if grade > target + 1
const DELTA_VERY_HARD=3;// red if grade > target + 3
/* FRE kept for tooltips only */const DEBOUNCE_MS=200;const COLOR_MAP={yellow:{bg:"#fff3b0",border:"#facc15"},// nicer yellow

blue:{bg:"#dbeafe",border:"#93c5fd"}};export default function TiptapEditor(_ref){let{targetGrade}=_ref;const[stats,setStats]=useState({wordCount:0,sentenceCount:0,grade:0,ease:0});const focus:outline-none"}}});const debounce=(fn,ms)=>{let t;return function(){for(var _len=arguments.length,a=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){a[_key]=arguments[_key];}clearTimeout(t);t=setTimeout(()=>fn(...a),ms);};};const classify=(words,grade,target)=>{const delta=grade-target;if(delta>DELTA_VERY_HARD||words>=HEMI_VERY_HARD_WORDS)return"red";if(delta>DELTA_HARD||words>=HEMI_HARD_WORDS)return"yellow";if(words>=LONG_SENTENCE_WORDS)return"blue";return null;};const applyHighlight=(from,to,color,tip)=>{const cfg=COLOR_MAP[color];if(!cfg)return;editor.chain().focus().setTextSelection({from,to}).setHighlight({color:cfg.bg,HTMLAttributes:{title:tip,"data-tip":tip,style:`background-color:${cfg.bg}; border:1px solid ${cfg.border}; border-radius:2px; padding:0 0.08em; color:inherit;`}}).run();};const analyzeAndHighlight=useCallback(()=>{if(!editor)return;const fullText=editor.getText();const signature=`${fullText.length}:${targetGrade}:${MODE}`;if(signature===lastSignature.current)return;lastSignature.current=signature;setStats({wordCount:countWords(fullText),sentenceCount:countSentences(fullText),grade:calculateFleschKincaidGrade(fullText),ease:calculateFleschReadingEase(fullText)});editor.chain().focus().unsetHighlight().run();const{doc}=editor.state;doc.descendants((node,pos)=>{const isAnalyzable=["paragraph","list_item","heading"].includes(node.type.name);if(!isAnalyzable)return;const text=node.textContent;if(!text)return;const parts=text.match(/[^.!?…]+[.!?…]*/g)||[];let searchFrom=0;for(const raw of parts){const s=raw.trim();if(!s){searchFrom+=raw.length;continue;}const{wordCount,syllableCount,grade}=analyzeSentence(s);const fre=206.835-1.015*wordCount-84.6*(syllableCount/Math.max(1,wordCount));const color=classify(wordCount,grade,targetGrade);if(!color){searchFrom+=raw.length;continue;}const startInNode=text.indexOf(s,searchFrom);if(startInNode!==-1){const from=pos+1+startInNode;const to=from+s.length;const tip=`Words ${wordCount}, grade ${grade.toFixed(1)}, target ${targetGrade}, FRE ${fre.toFixed(1)}`;applyHighlight(from,to,color,tip);searchFrom=startInNode+s.length;}else{searchFrom+=raw.length;}}});editor.chain().focus().setTextSelection({from:fullText.length}).run();},[editor,targetGrade]);const debounced=useCallback(debounce(analyzeAndHighlight,DEBOUNCE_MS),[analyzeAndHighlight]);useEffect(()=>{if(!editor)return;editor.on("update",debounced);debounced();return()=>editor.off("update",debounced);},[editor,debounced]);if(!editor)return
